name: Deady Disco
description:
It is Saturday night and you are on your way to the club, but suddenly, you black out and wake up in a endless black void on a dance floor. As you stand back up, a loud voice rings out... "Are you worthy to be called the king of funk? Dance as long as you can, but watch your step, or you may fall! Only those who dance the longest are worthy of that title! Are you ready to boogy?"

In this game, you must move on the dance floor to gain points. There are four stages to choose from and 3 songs to choose from.  If you choose a faster speed, you gain points more quickly, but the floor falls more quickly too. If you fall, it's game over!

Now... are you ready to boogy?

Controls:

D-pad - move player

A button - select
